headline: Will News Corp’s (NWSA) Governance Updates Shift Its Approach to Managing Legal and Strategic Risks?
summary: At its Annual Meeting on November 19, 2025, News Corporation shareholders approved several amendments to the Certificate of Incorporation, including limiting certain officer liabilities and adding a federal forum selection provision for Securities Act claims. The elimination of the obsolete corporate opportunity waiver and clarifications to forum provisions reflect a focus on modernizing governance and strengthening legal frameworks. We’ll explore how this focus on enhanced governance and...
